segments.text: This kitchen feels a bit chaotic underneath the surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so intent on her plate that she misses everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own world, unaware of the trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flooding out, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and no one's noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he could tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, but this could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules by sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's foot is in the puddle, but she keeps drying away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me feel a bit down.
segments.speaker: PAR
